title: Russia hits Ukraine energy sites in 'most powerful blow' so far this year
content: The attack - which reportedly consisted of more than 70 missiles and 450 drones - comes after a so-called "energy truce" expired at the weekend.

title: Fifa president 'infantile' for wanting to lift Russia ban, Ukraine minister says
content: Ukraine's sports minister calls Fifa president Gianni Infantino "irresponsible" and "infantile" for saying it will look at lifting a ban on Russia.

title: Ukraine hails 'real results' after Musk restricts Russian Starlink use
content: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.

title: Russia welcomes Infantino’s comments on lifting ban; Ukraine furious
content: FIFA chief Infantino suggested the ban on Russia's participation in global football competitions should be lifted.

title: Last US-Russia nuclear treaty is expiring: Does it really matter?
content: The New START treaty, which limits strategic nuclear weapons, is to expire this week.

title: Russia ready to respond to any US weapons deployment in Greenland: Ryabkov
content: With New START, the last nuclear treaty between Russia and US ending, Moscow says it's ready for more dangerous world.

title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
content: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

title: US says it shot down Iranian drone flying towards aircraft carrier
content: A US military spokesman says the drone was shot down while approaching an American vessel in the Arabian Sea.

title: BBC on the front line with Colombia's war on drugs
content: BBC Senior international correspondent Orla Guerin joined a special operation over Colombia's cocaine heartland, tasked with destroying crude cocaine labs hidden deep in the jungle.

title: The cold, hungry reality of displacement in war-torn Sudan’s Tawila
content: Displaced families who fled el-Fasher face dire conditions with no blankets, food shortages, and few medical supplies.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: Second round of peace talks set to begin in Abu Dhabi
content: The main sticking point in the negotiations continues to be the long-term fate of territory in eastern Ukraine.

title: China warns Panama as Hong Kong firm contests ruling on canal ports
content: China calls court ruling against Hong Kong firm CK Hutchison on Panama Canal ports 'absurd' and 'shameful'.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,441
content: These are the key developments from day 1,441 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
content: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.

title: Fearing Russia will seize her town, war widow moves husband's grave to Kyiv
content: Russia's gains on the battlefield have forced Natalia to rebury her husband.

title: Watch: The US and Russia's nuclear treaty is dead. What comes next?
content: The expiration of New START means there are no limits on nuclear weapons between both countries for the first time since 1991.

title: US-Iran talks live: Critical talks to begin in Oman in push to prevent war
content: US and Iranian officials are holding talks in Muscat amid escalating tensions and a US military buildup in the Gulf.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,443
content: These are the key developments from day 1,443 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

title: Trump rejects call from Russia’s Putin to extend cap on nuclear deployments
content: US president says that he wants to negotiate replacement for strategic nuclear deployment treaty that recently expired.

title: ‘Sorry for being away’: Ukraine, Russia swap prisoners of war
content: More than 300 prisoners of war are finally heading home on Thursday after Ukraine and Russia reached a deal for a swap.

title: Gaza flotilla organisers in South Africa warn against Israeli interception
content: Activists announced at a briefing in South Africa plans to launch the largest civilian-led flotilla to Gaza in March.

title: Germany’s Merz warns of potential escalation as US, Iran prepare for talks
content: Friedrich Merz said concerns about a further escalation with Iran have dominated his trip to the Gulf region.

title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
content: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
content: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

title: US has given Ukraine and Russia June deadline to end war: Zelenskyy
content: Ukraine's president says the US has also proposed new trilateral talks in Miami, which he said Ukraine will attend.

title: Israel’s Gaza genocide risks global order, leaders warn at Al Jazeera Forum
content: Israel's war on Gaza and actions beyond are reshaping global politics and threatening global stability, forum hears.

title: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
content: The suspects include the alleged gunman, Lyubomir Korba, whom Russia says fled to the UAE after the attack.

title: Russia says second suspect in general’s shooting arrested in Dubai
content: Lyubomir Korba is extradited from the UAE, where he fled hours after Friday's attack, Russia's FSB says.
